sentence.Network_en: The Brown Thrasher can be found in neighborhoods and fields throughout Georgia.
sentence.Network_cn: 布朗长尾鲛可在社区和领域格鲁吉亚各地.

sentence.Network_en: Right now, only some English sparrows and a curved - bill thrasher.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在只有一些英国麻雀外加一只弯喙矢嘲鸫.

sentence.Network_en: Thrasher said: Rhys has a normal immune system.
sentence.Network_cn: 思拉舍说: 里斯具有正常的免疫系统.

thrash 打thrasher 鸫鸟之类thrashing 鞭打
嘲鸟(Mockingbird)与猫鹊（catbird）和长尾鲛（thrasher）有亲。它的名字则来源于它能够模仿其它鸟叫，甚至猫的“喵喵”声。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: perhaps from English dialect thrusher, thresher 'thrush'

means.word_mean: 1. a farm machine for separating seeds or grain from the husks and straw
2. thrush-like American songbird able to mimic other birdsongs
3. large pelagic shark of warm seas with a whiplike tail used to round up small fish on which to feed
